mapper.insert: insert into company (ID, NAME, type, grade, STATUS, CITY, ADDRESS, PHONE, EMAIL, NOTE, ATTR) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{grade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{attr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update company
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
grade = #{grade,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

ATTR = #{attr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
